title: Tech bounce lifts indices and sentiment - Economic Times
content:
1. Tech bounce lifts indices and sentiment  Economic Times
  2. Stocks To Watch Before Budget 2022: Adani Ports, Tech Mahindra, Indian Hotels, Sona BLW, Kansai Nerolac, VIP  BloombergQuint
  3. Bulls roar on D-Street. Pre-Budget rally, short covering or tech pullback?  Business Standard
  4. Sensex zooms 700 pts ahead of Economic Survey; Tech Mahindra, Wipro top gainers  Mint
  5. Tata Motors, Indian Oil, HPCL, Tata Steel, SBI, DLF, Tech Mahindra among stocks in focus on Budget 2022 day  The Financial Express

description: Indian equities jumped over 1% on Monday a day before the Union Budget, with beaten-down technology stocks leading the gains. Local stocks were mirroring the strength in global markets triggered by the rebound on Wall Street on Friday. The Sensex ended up 752.26 points or 1.32% at 57,952.49 while the Nifty closed 237.90 points or 1.4% higher at 17,339.85.
